post.author: 이홍식
post.content:
Ontario desperate for doctors Province needs 1,500 physicians to meet rising patient demand Theresa Boyle, Mary Gordon and Anne Kelly TORSTAR NEWS SERVICE
The prognosis is frightening. (가정의 부족에 따른 부정적인 결과의) 예측은 섬뜩하다.
야후사전... prog·no·sis － n. (pl. -ses ) [Ｕ][Ｃ] 1 『醫』 예후(豫後). ㆍ 치료 후의 병의 경과의 예상. 2 예언, 예상.
Cambridge Dictionary... prognosis, prognostication noun [C] FORMAL a doctor's judgment of the likely or expected development of a disease or of the chances of getting better or, more generally, a statement of what is judged likely to happen in the future, esp. in connection with a particular situation The prognosis after the operation was for a full recovery. I was reading a gloomy economic prognosis in the paper this morning.
post.title: prognosis
